passwordExchanged.text: You posted some great things on "Conectado", didn't you?
I didn't expect that from you. It's like the one writing wasn't you.

phoneFound.text: Look at your comments in the chat. Suface, you surprised us all.
I didn't expect that from you. It's like the one writing wasn't you. Hahaha.

phoneNotFound.text: Looks like you're going to need a new mobile phone, right?
I hope you don't lose that one too... or get taken from you.

enough.text: Let's do something. When classes are over, let's talk where none can hear us.
We talk about it, you apologise and we leave you in peace.
Anna and I will leave you alone, and the rest can do whatever they want.

talked.text: When classes are over, remember to come to the toilets.

notTalked.text: No tengo nada que hablar contigo.

talked.text: I have nothing to talk to you.
